body_content.explanation: a flat type of sea urchin (= a small sea creature with a round shell covered with sharp points) that lives partly in sand below the surface of the water. The outer skeletons (= the bony frame supporting the body) of dead sand dollars are often found on beaches:
examples: Sand dollars are marine creatures that are roughly the size of the palm of your hand.
She spent a carefree hour on the beach searching for sand dollars.
